tool_description: SEO Master Scan is your go-to solution for comprehensive website analysis and SEO optimization. Harness the power of detailed SEO reports, performance metrics, and actionable recommendations to boost your site's visibility and ranking. With our intuitive tool, unlock the secrets to superior website performance and stay ahead in the digital race.
name: SEO Master Scan: Website Analysis & Performance Reporting
title: SEO Master Scan: Website Analysis & Performance Reporting
tool_name: SEO Master Scan: Website Analysis & Performance Reporting

api_list.name: getReport
api_list.description: Retrieves category groups for the specified URL. Returns cached data if available, otherwise queues the URL for analysis.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The target URL to fetch category groups for.

api_list.name: getRecommendations
api_list.description: Fetches recommendations for the specified URL. Returns cached data if available, otherwise queues the URL for analysis.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The target URL to fetch recommendations for.

api_list.name: getPerformanceMetrics
api_list.description: Fetches performance metrics for a specified URL. Returns cached data if available, otherwise queues the URL for analysis.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The target URL to fetch performance metrics for.

api_list.name: getScreenshot
api_list.description: Fetches a screenshot for the specified URL. Returns cached data if available, otherwise queues the URL for analysis.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The target URL to fetch a screenshot for.

api_list.name: getPageInfo
api_list.description: Retrieves information about the specified page. Returns cached data if available, otherwise queues the URL for analysis.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The target URL to fetch page information for.
